name: Business Pinata
description:
Business Piñata is a game about business. Try to find the right handshake to make a deal with crooked celebrities: Donald Trump, Rupert Murdock, Margaret Thatcher... Grab the hand inside the controller and shake it to make tremendous amounts of money!

The game has been made during the Zoo Machines Festival 2015, a game jam about alternative controllers.

Game made in 48h by Victor Depardieu, David Hayward, Luc Leture & Antoine Villecroze
